patterns: Tell me about the history of the Faculty of Engineering at Ain Shams University.
What is the background of the Faculty of Engineering, Ain Shams University?
Can you provide the history of the Faculty of Engineering at Ain Shams University?
History of Faculty of Engineering, Ain Shams University
intents.responses: The history of the Faculty of Engineering at Ain Shams University dates back to 1839 when it was first known as the School of Technical Operations. In 1932, it evolved into the School of Applied Engineering. By 1946, it was declared the High Institute of Engineering by a Ministerial Decree. In 1950, Law 93 established Ibrahim Pasha University, with the High Institute of Engineering forming the base of its Faculty of Engineering. Finally, in 1954, Law 493 renamed Ibrahim Pasha University to Ain Shams University, and it has been known as the Faculty of Engineering, Ain Shams University ever since.
